full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 155 of 247 283 LBUVMAX4 Visoski - redirect 1 Q. I just want to make this clear because I know we're dealing with some pseudonym issues, so just listen to the question please. 2 A. Okay. 3 Q. The person we're calling Jane -- 4 A. Yes. 5 Q. -- did you meet her in the 1990s, to the best of your recollection? 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. And the person who is depicted in Defense Exhibits LV3A and 8 LV3B, did you meet her in the 2000s, to the best of your 9 recollection? 10 A. Yes. To the best of my recollection, that's a perfect 11 example of how I could remember; so that is correct, yes, 12 Ms. Comey. 13 Q. And do you have that memory because the person depicted in 14 Defense Exhibits LV3A and 3B you remember on the Boeing? 15 A. That's correct. That was my synopsis. 16 THE COURT: Sorry. Just a moment. 17 MR. EVERDELL: Objection. Leading. 18 THE COURT: Overruled. 19 You may finish. You may finish your answer. 20 THE WITNESS: Oh, I'm sorry. 21 A. That is correct, Ms. Comey. It was a way of correlating a 22 name to a date or a person to a date. 23 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017517
